description:
EXPRESSION OF INTEREST - TENDER BY 30TH JUNE 2022

RARE & ENDLESS BUILDING DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITIES!!

77 & 79 & 81 COLLINS ST, ST MARYS & 80 & 82 & 78 MAMRE RD, ST MARYS !!!

PORTFOLIO SHOWCASES 5,096 SQM, 6 X BLOCKS+ Approx. 50 METER FRONTAGE. DUAL Access. Situated in a Prime Location of St Mary's. THIS IS A ONCE IN A LIFETIME OPPORTUNITY TO PURCHASE 5 IN 1 OR SECURE EACH BLOCK SINGULARLY!!

Property Results is Proud to present 77 & 79 & 81 Collins St, St Mary's + 80 & 82 &79 Mamre Rd, St Marys
3X BLOCKS ON MAMRE ROAD + 3 X BLOCKS ON COLLINS ST, ST MARY'S!

Calling All Investors, Building Developers. Introducing a Rare Opportunity to procure this site with DA Approval for 8 Room Boarding house + Extra Dwelling. The building Development Potential for this site are ENDLESS!!

Opportunities like this RARELY comes on the market. This property has a total land size of 5096 SQM +R3 Zoning + 6 Blocks with 7 x Dwellings + Vacant Block of land, offering dual street access from Mamre Rd and Collins Street.

PROCURE 6X BLOCKS OR PURCHASE BLOCKS SINGULARLY!

Let's talk location, St Marys is a HOT area for Development with St Mary's station as the proposed Interchange for Badgery Creek airport. This site is within meters access to M4 Motorway from Mamre Rd yet enjoying the quite street life access to Collins Street.
this amazing development opportunity that consists off 6 massive adjoining blocks numbers 77Collins Street, 79 Collins Street, 81 Collins Street, 78 Mamre Road, 80 Mamre Road and 82 Mamre Road St Marys. TOTAL OF 6X BLOCKS!!

Showing 5,096SQM of PRIME LAND with DUAL ACCESS from Mamre Road and Collins Street, R3 zoning with the potential to build townhouses, duplexes or apartments ( S.T.C.A ).

St Mary's is HOT now and only 5 minutes drive to St Mary's train station, which is going to be the interchange for Badgerys Creek Airport.
